search.like: Returns all doubloons where this field contains yer query.
search.exact: Returns all doubloons where this field exactly matches yer query.
search.comma: Ye can search fer multiple values by separatin' 'em with a comma.
search.like_prepend: If ye put "=" afore yer query, it will search fer an exact match which be faster in some occasions.
search.players: Ye can put "name=" or "identifier=" in front o' yer query an' it will scrounge fer an exact match in that field, arr.
search.starts_with: Returns all rows where this field starts wit' yer query, ye scurvy dog.

metadata.title: Log-Entry doubloons
metadata.secondary_unknown: Thar be a mystery surroundin' the secondary death reason.
metadata.secondary_player: The scallywag was sent to Davy Jones' locker by another pirate with the server-id {0}.
metadata.secondary_npc: The scallywag was sent to Davy Jones' locker by a cursed landlubber.
metadata.secondary_vehicle: The scallywag was sent to Davy Jones' locker by a ship. Server-ID of the captain: {0}.
metadata.secondary_touching: Avast ye scallywags! At the time of death the lubber was touchin' these ships: {0}.

detail.title: Detailed sailin' off reason
detail.description: This here be explainin' in more detail how me matey '{0}' left the game.
detail.read_more: Read more about sailin' off reasons, ye landlubber...

reasons.exited: The matey be sailin' off the game by typin' 'quit' in the F8 console or pressin' ALT and F4 or similar.
reasons.disconnected: Arrgh! The scurvy dog walked the plank and be gone from the ship by typin' 'disconnect' in the F8 console or somethin' similar.
reasons.crash: Avast! The scallywag's game be crashin' with the error message bein' given.
reasons.timeout: Blimey! The scurvy dog's connection to the ship timed out. This be usually happenin' when the internet connectivit be droppin' out.
reasons.banned: The scallywag be banned by a matey from the crew with the given reason.
reasons.restart: The scallywag was sent to Davy Jones' locker by the ship as it be restartin'.
reasons.kicked: Arr! The scallywag was given the boot by a matey of the crew with the given reason.
reasons.job: Arr! The landlubber's job pirate booty be expired. This means the scallywag be waitin' too long in the queue for the job priority so the system made 'em walk the plank outta the queue.
reasons.doors: Arr! The server tried to synchronize the ship's doors with the scallywag but failed, so it threw 'em overboard as it be unable to fix this error.
reasons.global: Arr! The system smelled somethin' fishy from the scallywag and gave 'em a grand global OP-FW ban.
reasons.editor: Arr! The scurvy dog be openin' their Rockstar Editor which magic'ly sends 'em off the server ye be sailin' on.
reasons.overflow: Avast ye! FiveM be settin' sails to keep the server safe from cheaters who be tryin' to bombard yer waters with their foul tricks.
reasons.another: The scallywag be connectin' straight to another server without settin' foot on dry land from this one.
reasons.config: Whilst tryin' to hoist the sails and connect the servers, the configuration be failin' to load, makin' the user walk the plank.
reasons.unknown: Yarr! No treasure map be present to give ye details. Ye be askin' a developer for a hand, matey.

panel_logs.title: Boardin' Logs
panel_logs.description: On this here page ye can spy 'n sift through the boardin' logs.
panel_logs.no_logs: No logs be found, ye scurvy dog.

login.title: Set yer sails an' login wit' yer Discord account.
login.description: Arr, matey! Login wit' th' same Discord account that be linked t' th' scurvy dog ye be holdin' yer staff permissions on. Usin' a different one will result in ye not bein' able t' access th' server panel.

weapons.title: Weapon Intelligence
weapons.damage_description: {0} usually be dishin' out 'bout {1} 'n' nothin' more than 'bout {2} damage.
